## Treasury and Investment Advisory Services Solicitation (#2021-3042 - 2023)
### Description

The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) is issuing this solicitation to establish additional Supply Arrangements for the provision of Treasury and Investment Advisory Services.

### Key Information
- **Solicitation Number**: #2021-3042 - 2023
- **Publication Date**: May 1, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 9, 2023, at 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 17, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: May 16, 2024

### Services Required
Two service streams are being sought:

1. **Ex Ante Funding and Loss Absorbency**: This service stream includes providing advice on strategic and risk management aspects related to deposit-taking institutions (DTIs).
2. **Investments and Sources of Liquidity**: Services for this stream include advice on investing and financing DTIs through sources such as working capital, technological upgradation, and current businesses.

### Eligibility Requirements

Only qualified suppliers will be considered.

### Evaluation Criteria

The Canadian trade agreements, such as the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), apply.

### Geographical Scope

All services required under this solicitation will have to be performed in Canada.

### Submission Requirements
Tenders must be submitted electronically to Bidgateway.

### Important Documents
For more information and the solicitation document, kindly visit the following links:
*   [Supply Arrangement Agreement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5103/cdic-rfsa-2021-3042---2023-refresh-treasury-and-investment-advisory-services.pdf)
*   [MS Word Forms](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5103/2021-3042-2023-english-ms-word-forms.zip)
*   [Attachment - Service Briefs](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5103/cdic-rfsa-2021-3042-refresh-2023_ad-1_en.pdf)

Please, contact SADC Procurement at (343) 576-2218 or procurement@cdic.ca if you have any questions. You may also visit the Bidgateway website for more information about doing business with Canada.
